Translations.Text: M
revelation this scripture est DI Almighty Sagx
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them specif purpose finite interim Those disbelieve est totally oblivious al warnings don them
dir Konsider idols vi set DI. Montr me ki sur ter did ili kre! Ili own part de heavens? Montr me any ali scripture antaux this 1, any pec establ knowledge supports your idolatry vi est truthful
Who est farther astray than those idolize DI idols neniam respond them Tag Resurrection est totally unaware de their worship
Kaj when popol summoned Tag Judgment their idols igx their enemies denunc their idolatry
When our revelations recited them perfectly klar those disbelieved dir de truth ven them This est obviously magic
When ili dir Li fabricated this dir mi fabricated this tiam vi ne protekt me DI! Li est fully aware da cxio vi scheme Li suffices as witness me vi. Li est Forgiver Merciful
dir mi est different el ali messengers. Mi ne hav ide ki vol okaz me vi. Mi nur sekv ki revealed me Mi est ne plur than profound warner
Dir Ki se gxi DI vi est disbelieved en gxi? witness el Infan Israel bor witness simil phenomenon li kred while vi torn arrogant! Surely DI ne direkt wicked popol
Those disbelieved dir pri those kred est anything bon ili ne akcept gxi antaux us ili ne direkt gxi ili dir This est old fabrication
Antaux this libr Moses proviz guidance mercy. This tro est scripture konfirm Arabic avert those transgressed don bon news des righteous
Surely those dir Our Lord est DI tiam plumb righteous life ne hav tim nor vol ili grieve
Ili ind Paradise kie ili abide forever rekompenc their works

Ni enjoined human est honor his parents His mother bor him arduously don nask al him arduously sorb intim zorg de him 30 monat! When li reaches maturity reaches agx de 40 li dir My Lord direct me sxat blessings Vi bestowed me my parents do righteous works placx Vi! Let my infan est righteous ankaux! Mi pent Vi; mi est submitter
est these ni akcept righteous works overlook their pek. Ili ind Paradise. This est truthful promes promes them

(Tiam tie unu est dir al his parents Ve vi; vi telling me death) mi ven life? Kiel ven those mort antaux us neniam ven parents cry di help dir Ve al vi; placx kred! Di promes est truth. Li dir Tales preter
Such unu stamp disbelievers cxiu generaci de jinns humans; ili est losers
Ili all ating rang ili ind en accordance kun their works Li pag them their works malplej injustice

Tag ven when those disbelieved introduced hellfire Vi wasted bon sxanc don vi your worldly life vi gxoj en them. Consequently hodiaux vi incur shameful retribution as requital arrogance vi committed ter any basis kaj your evil works
Recall ke frat ‘Aad avert his popol dunes! - numerous warnings ankaux liver antaux him post him Vi ne worship DI. Mi tim por vi retribution de great tag
Ili dir vi ven divert us our di? Ni challenge vi bring (retribution) vi minac vi est truthful
Li dir knowledge this est DI; mi nur liver vi ki mi est send al liver! Mi seg ke vi popol est ignorant
When ili seg sxtorm rubrik their voj ili dir This sxtorm bring us mult bezon pluv Instead this est ki vi challenged Hood bring violent vent wherein tie est painful retribution
Gxi detru cxio as komand its Lord Per maten nothing star their hejm. Ni tiel requite kulp popol

Ni establ them sam voj as ni establ vi proviz them auxd okul mens! their auxd okul mens ne help them je all This ili decid disregard di revelations. Tiel prophecies warnings ili ridiculed kauxz their doom
Ni annihilated many communities vi post ni eksplik proofs ili pent
Why tiam idols ili set bring them closer al DI fail help them? Instead ili abandoned them. Such est false di ili idolized such est innovations ili fabricated
Recall ti ni directed a numer da jinns vi en ord let them auxd Quran! When ili got tie ili dir Auxskult. gxi over ili rushed their popol avert
Ili dir O our popol ni auxd libr revealed Moses konfirm previous scriptures. Gxi direkt truth; al des tuj path
O our popol respond vok DI kred en Him! Li tiam forgive your pek sxpar vi painful retribution
Those fail respond di vok ne escape ne hav Lord Him; ili ir far astray
Ili ne realize ti DI kre heavens ter malplej effort est able al revive dead jes ja; Li est Omnipotent
Tag disbelievers introduced Hellfire ili pet Est this ne truth? Ili respond Jes ja our Lord Li dir Tiam sufer retribution your disbelief
Do est pacient messengers vi posed strength resorted pacienc. Ne est en a hurry

seg retribution inevitably ven them. Tag ili seg gxi seem as ili last 1 hor tag. This proclamation est gxi ne wicked who est consistently annihilated . . [47:1] Those disbelieve repel path DI Li nullifies their works
Those kred work righteousness kred en ki send down Muhammad! - which est truth their Lord - Li remits their pek ben them contentment
This est those disbelieve sekv falsehood while those kred sekv truth their Lord DI TIEL cites POPOL their EKZEMPL

Vi renkont (en milit) those disbelieve vi strik kol! Vi pren them captives vi set them liber ransom them milit ends Hav DI willed Li granted vi victory milit! Li tiel tests vi 1 another As por those get killed ig DI Li neniam put their ofer waste
Li direkt them ben them contentment
Li admit them Paradise Li described them
O vi kred vi support DI Li support vi strengthen your foothold
Those disbelieve incur mizer; Li kauxz their works est utterly en vain
Ke because ili hated ki DI revealed consequently Li nullifies their works
Ili ne roam ter Did seg consequences por those antaux them? DI detru their works all disbelievers SUFER SAM SORT
This est DI est Lord de those kred while disbelievers ne hav lord
DI admits those kred PLUMB righteous life into GXARDEN FLU streams As por those disbelieve ili viv mangx like best mangx tiam end hellfire
Many community est mult fort than community ke evicted vi your town; when ni annihilated them ne 1 help them
Est those enlightened their Lord sam as those evil works ornam their okul ili sekv their own opinions

allegory Paradise promes righteous est this gxi hav river unpolluted akv river de fresx lakt river de vin! - delicious por drinkers - River strained miel. Ili hav all kinds da frukt therein forgiveness el their Lord Ili bon those (est abide forever thehellfire drink hellish akv larm their intest)
Kelk da them auxskult al vi tiam as baldaux as ili las ili pet those enlightened Ki did li just dir DI tiel sigel their kor consequently ili sekv nur their opinions
As por those direkt Li eg their guidance grants them their righteousness
Ili waiting Hor est ven them suddenly All sign thereof jam ven. Once Hor ven them kiel ili do gxi benefit el their message
Vi kon ti Tie ne est ali di DI pet forgiveness de your pek pek de all kred hom women DI est fully aware da your decisions your ultimate destiny
Those kred dir When vol neo sura revealed when straightforward sura revealed wherein batal menci vi seg those harbored dub their kor rigard vi death jam ven them! Ili tiel exposed
Obedience righteous utterances expected de them. Nur ili montr confidence DI when mobilization est vok gxi est put por them
Est gxi ankaux your intention vi las vi commit evil mistreat your relativ
est those incurred curse DI whereby Li rendered them surd blind
Why ili ne stud Quran carefully Ili hav seruv their mens
Surely those slide dors guidance manifested them diabl enticed them plumb them sur
This est ili dir al those hated ki DI send down Ni obe vi nepr materi. DI fully kon their sekret conspiracies
Kiel gxi do gxi por them when angxel est put them al death? Ili bat them their vizagx their rear ends
This because ili sekv ki angered DI hated ajx placx Him! Consequently Li nullified their works
those haven dub their kor pens ke Did DI testament ne bring out their evil thoughts
Ni testament ni expose them vi tial ke vi recognize them just rigard them. Vi recognize them per des voj ili talk DI est fully aware da all your works
Ni certainly put vi test en ord disting those vi who strive steadfastly persevere Ni expose your prav kvalit
Those disbelieve repel path DI oppose messenger guidance manifested por them neniam dolor DI en des malplej Instead Li nullifies their works
O vi kred vi obe DI obe messenger. Otherwise all your works est en vain
Those disbelieve repel path DI tiam mort disbelievers DI testament neniam forgive them
Do vi ne waver surrender pursuit pac vi garanti victory DI est vi. Li neniam waste your efforts
This worldly life est ne plur than lud vanity. Vi kred plumb righteous life Li rekompenc vi pet vi any mon
Se Li pet vi mon al extent kre hardship vi vi igx stingy your fel evil might exposed
Vi invit spend ig DI kelk da vi torn stingy stingy est stingy towards their own anim. DI est RICX while VI est poor Vi turn Li substitute ali popol your met ili ne est vi
(Ni bestowed vi O Messenger) great victory
Whereby DI forgives your preter pek ankaux as future pek perfekt His blessings vi direkt vi rekt path
Additionally DI testament support vi unwavering support
Li est Unu ej contentment kor believers eg plur faith ankaux al their faith! Al DI aparten all forces de heavens ter! DI est Omniscient SAGX
Li certainly admit kred hom women into gxarden flu streams wherein ili abide forever Li remit their pek. This est sight DI great triumf
Li requite hypocrite hom women idol worshipping hom women ili harbored evil thoughts DI. Their evil vol backfire them. Di est koler them kondamn them prepar them Gehenna! Ki miserable destiny
Al DI aparten all forces heavens ter! DI est Almighty SAGX
Ni send vi witness bearer bon news warner
Ke vi popol kred en DI His messenger reverence Him observ Him glor Him tag kaj nokt

Surely those pledge allegiance vi pledging allegiance DI. DI APROB their pledge LI EJ His MAN their MAN! Those violate such pledge commit violation al their own detriment. As por those fulfill their pledge DI Li grant them great recompense

sedentary Arabs rest behind dir Ni preoccupied our mon our famili pet forgiveness us! Ili utter their lang ki ne est their kor! Dir Who protekt vi DI se Li willed any adversity vi aux se Li willed any ben vi? DI est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do
Vi secretly kred messenger believers defeated neniam ven their famili this firmly establ your kor! Vi harbored evil thoughts torn into wicked popol
Anyone rifuz kred en DI His messenger ni prepar disbelievers hellfire
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! Li forgives whomever Li vol pun whomever Li vol! DI est Forgiver Merciful

sedentary who rest behind dir when vi expected kolekt spoils de milit Let us sekv vi akci en this!" Ili tiel wish alter di vort! Dir Vi ne sekv us! This est di decision. Ili tiam dir Vi est envious de us (por rest behind Ja ili rarely kompren anything)

Dir al sedentary Arabs rest Vi invit vizagx powerful popol batal them ili submit! Se vi obe DI testament rekompenc vi generous recompense Vi turn re vi did en des preter, Li requite vi painful retribution
Blind ne est blamed crippled ne est blamed sick ne est blamed Those obe DI His messenger Li admit them gxarden flu streams As por those turn Li requite them painful retribution
DI PLACX believers pledged allegiance VI ARB. Li kon ki est their kor consequently Li ben them contentment rekompenc them immediate victory
Additionally ili gajn many spoils DI est Almighty SAGX
DI PROMES VI many spoils KE VI GAJN. Li do advanced kelk benefits vi en this life Li withheld popol man aggression vi rendered this sign believers! Li tiel direkt vi rekt path
As por grup vi possibly ne defeat DI sorb zorg da them; DI est Omnipotent
disbelievers ever batal vi ili turn around flee! Ili ne hav Lord Mastr; ili ne hav helper
Such est di sistem throughout histori, vi trov di sistem est unchangeable
Li est Unu withheld their man aggression vi withheld your man aggression them en val Mecca post Li granted vi victory over them! DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do

est ili disbelieved barred vi el Sankt Masjid ecx prevent your offerings reaching their destination! tie kred hom women enemy camp vi ne kon vi est pri al dolor them unknowingly! DI TIEL admits His mercy whomever LI VOL. Ili persist Li requite those them disbelieve painful retribution

While those disbelieved enraged their kor filled pride tag ignorance DI ben His messenger believers peaceful contentment directed them uphold vort righteousness! This est ki ili nu ind DI est fully aware da all AJX

DI fulfilled His messenger's truthful VIZI VI enter SANKT Masjid DI testament perfectly secure VI FASON your HAR shorten GXI as VI fulfill pilgrimage rituals tie Vi ne hav any tim. Ekde Li kon ki vi ne kon Li coupled this immediate victory
Li est 1 who send His messenger guidance religi truth far gxi prevail all ali religi! DI suffices witness

Muhammad - messenger DI - those kun him est harsh pouxp disbelievers kind compassionate amongst themselves. Vi seg them bowing prostrating as ili streb di blessings approval Their mark est their vizagx because da prostrating! This est sam ekzempl as Torah. Their ekzempl en Gospel est plant kresk taller fort placx farmers! Li tiel enrages disbelievers. DI PROMES those them kred, PLUMB righteous life forgiveness great recompense
O vi kred ne ej your opinion ke de DI His messenger! Vi reverence DI. DI est Hearer Omniscient
O vi kred ne raise your vocx vocx prophet nor shall vi kri him vi kri je each ali lest your works igx nullified while vi ne perceive
Surely those lower their vocx messenger DI est unu kor prepar DI igx righteous! Ili ind forgiveness great recompense
As por those vok sur vi mur plej de them ne kompren
Hav ili est pacient gxis vi ven them gxi est put por them! DI est Forgiver Merciful
O vi kred wicked ul brings any news vi vi 1 investigate lest vi commit injustice kelk popol ignorance tiam igx sorry remorseful ki vi done

Kaj kon ti di messenger ven your midst! Hav li auxskult al vi many ajx vi far ajx difficult yourselves! Di far vi am faith ornam gxi your kor Li far vi abhor disbelief wickedness disobedience. These direkt unu
Such est grace DI His blessings. DI est Omniscient SAGX

grup believers batal each ali vi reconcile them. 1 grup aggresses ali vi batal aggressing grup gxis ili submit di ordon! Once ili submit vi reconcile 2 grup equitably. Vi argument justice DI am those est just
believers est members de 1 famili; vi keep pac within your famili reverence DI ke vi ating mercy

O vi ne kred popol ridicule ali popol ili est put than ili! Nor shall any women ridicule ali women ili est put than ili. Nor shall vi mok unu another far fun da your nom. Evil ja est reversion al wickedness post ating faith! Anyone ne pent this these est transgressors

O vi kred vi evit any suspicion ecx a malpli mord de suspicion est sinful. Vi ne spion 1 another nor shall vi backbite 1 another this est as abominable as mangx karn your dead frat! Vi certainly abhor this. Vi observ DI. DI est Redeemer Merciful
O popol ni kre vi sam vir female rendered vi distinct popol gent ke vi recognize unu another Bon among vi en sight DI est plej righteous. DI est Omniscient Cognizant

Arabs dir Ni est Mu'mens (believers.) Dir Vi ne kred; ki vi dir est ‘Ni est Muslims (submitters) ' belief establ your kor. vi obe DI His messenger Li ne put any da your works waste DI est Forgiver Merciful
Mu'mens (believers) est those kred en DI His messenger tiam ating status hav ne dub whatsoever strive their mon their viv en ig DI! These est truthful unu
Dir vi inform DI your religi? DI kon CXIO EN heavens TER. DI est Omniscient
Ili akt as ili doing vi komplez embracing Submission! Dir Vi ne doing me any komplez embracing Submission! DI est UNU EST doing VI great KOMPLEZ PER DIREKT VI AL faith VI est SINCER
DI kon all SEKRET EN heavens TER; DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do
kaj glorious Quran
Ili trov gxi strang ke warner el them ven them! disbelievers dir This est really strang
Post ni mort igx polv; this est impossible
Ni est fully aware da anyone de them gets konsum ter; ni hav accurate record
Ili rejected truth when gxi ven them; ili utterly konfuz
Ili ne rigard cxiel super them kiel ni konstru gxi ornam gxi flaw
Ni kre ter scattered gxi mont kresk gxi all kinds da bel plant
This est enlightenment reminder cxiu pi worshiper
Ni send cxiel ben akv kresk gxi gxarden grajn rikolt
Tall dat palm clustered frukt
Provisions popol. Ni revive gxi dead land; vi similarly resurrected
Disbelieving them est popol Noah dwellers Russ Thamoud
‘Aad Pharaoh brethren Lot
dwellers lign popol Tubba. All da them disbelieved messengers consequently My retribution befell them
Ni tro sxargx 1 creation? this why ili est dub resurrection
Ni kre human ni kon ki li flustr himself. Ni est closer al him than his jugular vejn
recording (angxel) je dekstr je las constantly recording
Ne utterance does li utter vigl witness
Finally inevitable coma death ven; this est ki vi pen evade
Korn blov; this est promes tag
Cxiu anim ven kun herder witness
Vi uz est oblivious al this. Ni tuj remove your vual; hodiaux your vizi est as fort as sxtal
companion dir Here est my formidable testimony
Jxet into Gehenna cxiu stubborn disbeliever
Forbidder charity aggressor plen de dub
Li set DI another di. Jxet him into severe retribution
His companion dir Our Lord mi ne mislead him; li est far astray
Li dir ne feud Me mi suficx avert vi
Nothing sxangx nun. Mi est neniam unjust towards popol
Est tag when ni pet Infer Hav vi hav suficx Gxi dir Don me plur
Paradise ofert righteous readily
This est ki promes cxiu repenter steadfast
Ili reverenced plej Gracious en their privacy ven wholeheartedly
Enter gxi pac; this est Tag Eternity
Ili get anything ili wish therein ni hav eben plur
Many generaci them est powerful ni annihilated Ili sercx land; ili trov escape
This est lecion everyone posed mens est able al auxd witness
Ni kre heavens ter cxio them 6 tag neni fatigue tusx us
Do est pacient en des vizagx de their utterances lauxd glor your Lord antaux sunrise antaux sunset
Nokt vi medit His nom post prostrating
prepar tag when caller vok met est proksim
When ili auxd inevitable cry est tag vi ven
Ni est unu control life death; us est final destiny
Tag ven when ter krak en a hurry don roz them! Such summoning est facil por us do
Ni est fully aware da cxio ili utter while vi ne hav potenc them. Do remind this Quran those reverence My warnings
blov vent
Bor pluv
Bringing provisions
Distribu them as komand
Ki promes vi surely ven pas
Tag Judgment est inevitable
Despite perfectly kre cxiel
Vi ad disput truth
Deviating therefrom est deviators
Ve al falsifiers
En their blundering ili est totally heedless
Ili question Tag Judgment
Tag ili prezent fajr
Gust retribution; this est ki vi uz challenge
righteous ind gxarden printemp
Ili ricev their Lord's rekompenc ili uz est pi
Rarely did ili dorm whole nokt
Je dawn ili pregx forgiveness
portion their mon est set aside por beggar needy
Ter est plen da sign those est nepr
within vi seg
En heaven est your provision cxio promes vi
Per Lord de heaven ter this est as prav as ti vi parol
Vi not histori Abraham's honorable gast
Ili vizit him dir Pac. Li dir Pac al vi strangers
Li pet his famili prepar fat calf
When li ofert gxi them li remarked vi ne mangx
Li harbored tim de them! Ili dir ne Hav tim ili don bon news knowledgeable fil
His wife astonished Not her wrinkled vizagx mi est sterile old woman
Ili dir Tiel dir your Lord Li est plej Sagx Omniscient
